hooks.command: CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT="$(pwd)/.claude"; echo "\n=== AGENTIC-PIPELINE SESSION START ==="; echo "Loading context files..."; for ctx in context_container context_session context_conventions context_governance context_orchestration context_adr context_skills; do [ -f "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/context/${ctx}.md" ] && echo "  ✓ ${ctx}.md" || echo "  ✗ ${ctx}.md (missing)"; done; TURNS_INDEX="./ai/agentic-pipeline/turns_index.csv"; if [ -f "$TURNS_INDEX" ]; then LAST_TURN=$(tail -n +2 "$TURNS_INDEX" | cut -d',' -f1 | sort -n | tail -1); NEXT_TURN=$((LAST_TURN + 1)); echo "Last turn: ${LAST_TURN} | Next turn: ${NEXT_TURN}"; else echo "No turns yet — next turn will be: 1"; fi; echo "Governance: ACTIVE (metadata headers + ADR required)"; echo "=========================================="; exit 0

BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ "$BRANCH" = "main" ] || [ "$BRANCH" = "master" ]; then echo "ERROR: Direct edits to $BRANCH branch are not allowed. Create a feature branch: git checkout -b feature/your-work" >&2; exit 2; fi; exit 0

FILE="$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT_FILE"; if [ -f "$FILE" ]; then EXT="${FILE##*.}"; case "$EXT" in ts|tsx|js|jsx|json|css|md) npx --yes prettier --write "$FILE" --log-level=silent 2>/dev/null || true;; esac; fi; exit 0

FILE="$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT_FILE"; if [[ "$FILE" == *"package.json" ]] && [[ "$FILE" != *"node_modules"* ]]; then DIR=$(dirname "$FILE"); (cd "$DIR" && pnpm install --silent 2>/dev/null || npm install --silent 2>/dev/null) & fi; exit 0

FILE="$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT_FILE"; if [[ "$FILE" == *".test.ts" ]] || [[ "$FILE" == *".test.tsx" ]] || [[ "$FILE" == *".spec.ts" ]]; then (pnpm test --run --reporter=dot 2>/dev/null | tail -5) & fi; exit 0
FILE="$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT_FILE"; if [[ "$FILE" == *".ts" ]] || [[ "$FILE" == *".tsx" ]]; then (pnpm typecheck 2>/dev/null | grep -E '^(error|✓)' | head -5) & fi; exit 0

statusLine.command: printf '%s | %s | %s' "$(basename $(pwd))" "$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-git')" "$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' ') changed"
